thread.title: BRIEF-Xg Technology Announces Retirement Of CEO And Executive Chairman George Schmitt

title: BRIEF-Xg Technology Announces Retirement Of CEO And Executive Chairman George Schmitt
text:
April 23, 2018 / 11:49 AM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Xg Technology Announces Retirement Of CEO And Executive Chairman George Schmitt Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 23 (Reuters) - xG Technology Inc: 
* XG TECHNOLOGY ANNOUNCES RETIREMENT OF CEO AND EXECUTIVE CHAIRMAN GEORGE SCHMITT; BOARD APPOINTS GARY CUCCIO AS EXECUTIVE CHAIRMAN AND INTERIM CEO 
* XG TECHNOLOGY - BOARD ALREADY IN DISCUSSIONS WITH CANDIDATES FOR PERMANENT CEO ROLE, HAS INITIATED A FORMAL SEARCH FOR A NEW PERMANENT CEO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
